name: Steaks & Bacon and the Case of the Angry Aardvark
blurb: An educational game about animal detectives on a case learning about diversity, U.S. coins and mathematics

rewards.reward: Free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android. Plus thank you in game credits.
Pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android. Plus thank you in game credits.
Pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android. Plus thank you in game credits.

Pack of three game art buttons. Plus Pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android. Plus thank you in game credits.

Game art t-shirt (Medium, Large, X-Large). Pick one of three styles. Plus pack of three game art buttons. Plus pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android. Plus thank you in game credits.

Access to Production blog as a contributor, and being a part of the design of the game. Name in credits as a producer. Plus game art t-shirt (Medium, Large, X-Large). Pick one of three styles. Plus pack of three game art buttons. Plus pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android.

18" x 24" foam board-mounted game art-pick one of three styles. Plus Access to Production blog as a contributor, and being a part of the design of the game. Name in credits as a producer. Plus game art t-shirt (Medium, Large, X-Large). Pick one of three styles. Plus pack of three game art buttons. Plus pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android.

Creative control (within reason) of one of the scenes within the case. Where the scene takes place, what happens there, how the detectives solve that step of the case, etc. You will also receive the standard $250 contribution rewards. If you do not plan on being active in the design of the game, please choose the standard $250 reward. Thanks.

Creative control (within reason) of one of the minor characters within the case. What animal it is, it's name, it's history, etc. You will also receive the standard $250 contribution rewards. If you do not plan on being active in the design of the game, please choose the standard $250 reward. Thanks.

12-month game-art bound calendar. The kind printed on 8-1/2" x 11" paper that you hang on the wall. The top page shows art, the bottom page is that month's calendar. Plus 18" x 24" foam board-mounted game art-pick one of three styles. Plus Access to Production blog as a contributor, and being a part of the design of the game. Name in credits as a producer. Plus game art t-shirt (Medium, Large, X-Large). Pick one of three styles. Plus pack of three game art buttons. Plus pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android.

Bad Guy Design Lead. You will have creative control (within reason) of the 'bad' guy, the antagonist, the villain, whatever you wish to call it. What animal it is, it's name, it's history, etc. You will also receive the standard $1000 contribution rewards. If you do not plan on being active in the design of the game, please choose the standard $1000 reward. Thanks.

24"x36" foam board mounted game art. Pick one of three styles. Plus 12-month game-art bound calendar. The kind printed on 8-1/2" x 11" paper that you hang on the wall. The top page shows art, the bottom page is that month's calendar.Plus 18" x 24" foam board-mounted game art-pick one of three styles. Plus Access to Production blog as a contributor, and being a part of the design of the game. Name in credits as a producer. Plus game art t-shirt (Medium, Large, X-Large). Pick one of three styles. Plus pack of three game art buttons. Plus pack of three game art bumper stickers. Plus pack of three game art postcards. Plus free copy of the game for iDevice, Blackberry OS, or Android.

Client Design Lead. You will have creative control (within reason) of the client that hires the detectives. What animal it is, it's name, it's history, etc. You will also receive the standard $1000 contribution rewards. If you do not plan on being active in the design of the game, please choose the standard $1000 reward. Thanks.
